titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1102) to establish the National Affordable Housing Trust Fund in the Treasury of the United States to provide for the development, rehabilitation, and preservation of decent, safe, and affordable housing for low-income families.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. Lee. Petition No: 108-11.

bill.summary: 7/22/2004--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1102) to establish the National Affordable Housing Trust Fund in the Treasury of the United States to provide for the development, rehabilitation, and preservation of decent, safe, and affordable housing for low-income families.
